xwikidoc.content: ### Home page platform.appwithinminutes.homePageTitle=Minut-app platform.appwithinminutes.description=Skab et nyt værktøj på få minutter med XWikis avancerede håndtering af datastrukturer (AppWithinMinutes). platform.appwithinminutes.createAppButtonLabel=Opret Minut-app platform.appwithinminutes.appsLiveTableHeading=Minut-apps ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appsLiveTable.doc.title=Application platform.appwithinminutes.appsLiveTable.doc.author=Senest ændret af platform.appwithinminutes.appsLiveTable.doc.date=Ændringsdato platform.appwithinminutes.appsLiveTable._actions=Handlinger platform.appwithinminutes.grantSpaceAdminRightsSaveComment=Giv rettighed til at opdatere området. ### AWM Applications panel entry platform.appwithinminutes.appPanelCreateEntry=Opret din egen! ### Wizard step platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepHeading=Trin {0} — {1} appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.name.name=Navn appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.name.title=Navngiv din Minut-app appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.name.description=Angiv et navn til denne Minut-app. appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.structure.name=Struktur appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.structure.title=Strukturér dine data appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.structure.description=Bestem strukturen for din Minut-app ved at angive hvilke datafelter den skal indeholde. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.entries.name=Entries ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.entries.title=Locate your data ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.entries.description=Choose where to store the data appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.presentation.name=Præsentation appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.presentation.title=Design din Minut-apps startside appWithinMinutes.wizardStep.presentation.description=Gør startsiden for din Minut-app personlig. platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepNextButtonLabel=Næste trin platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepNextButtonTip=Gå til næste trin platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepFinishButtonLabel=Afslut platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepFinishButtonTip=Gå til startsiden nu platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepPreviousButtonLabel=Forrige trin platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepPreviousButtonTip=Forrige platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepHelpTitle=Trin platform.appwithinminutes.wizardStepHelpDescription=Denne guide vil føre dig frem til din egen Minut-app. Hvert trin fastlægger hvordan anvendelsen skal se ud og hvilken form for information, der skal være i den: ### Wizard Step 1: Application Name ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.createApp.location.label=Location ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.createApp.location.hint=The location in the page hierarchy where the application will be created. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.createApp.parent.label=Parent ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.createApp.parent.hint=The parent of the new application. Leave this field empty if you want to create a top level application. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.createApp.parent.placeholder=Path.To.Parent ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.codeSpace.title=Code ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.codeSpace.description=This is the place where the application code is located. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.codeSpace.hiddenPagesInfo=The hidden pages are also listed, even though your current user profile settings prevent to do so, otherwise none of the application code pages would be visible because they are all hidden by default. platform.appwithinminutes.appNamePageTitle=Opret værktøj platform.appwithinminutes.appNameLabel=Navn på værktøjet platform.appwithinminutes.appNameHint=Navnet på værktøjet bestemmer hvilken URL startsiden får, hvilket område data gemmes i såvel som klassenavnet, hvori strukturen defineres. platform.appwithinminutes.appNamePreviewHomePageUrlLabel=Startside for værktøj ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appNamePreviewCodeSpaceLabel=Application code location platform.appwithinminutes.appNameIsUsedWarning=Denne Minut-app findes allerede. Hvis du fortsætter ændrer du på den eksisterende klasse. platform.appwithinminutes.appNameEmptyError=Giv værktøjet et navn ### Wizard Step 2: Application Structure platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorPaletteTitle=Felt-palette platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorPaletteHint=Træk og slip felter fra paletten til data feltet. platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorCanvasHint=Træk felter fra paletten og slip dem i dette område. platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorUpdateTemplateLabel=Opdater skema-klasse platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorUpdateTemplateHint=Gem standard værdier for skema-klasse ({0}). platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorUpdateSheetLabel=Opdater klasse-formular platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorUpdateSheetHint=Gendan standardformularen for skema-klasse ({0}). platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorUpdateTranslationsLabel=Opdatér samlinger af klasse-oversættelser platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorUpdateTranslationsHint=Opdatér oversættelse af feltnavne og listeværdier ({0}). platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorMultipleSheetsWarning=Denne klasse har flere formularer. platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorDuplicateFieldNameError=Klassen har to felter med det samme navn: {0} platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorTemplateSaveComment=Opdaterer standard værdier platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorBindSheetSaveComment=Bind klasse-formular platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorSheetSaveComment=Opdater klasse-formular platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorTranslationsSaveComment=Opdatér oversættelser platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorDatePickerClearSelectedDate=Slet platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorDatePickerSelectCurrentTime=Nu platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorDatePickerSelectCurrentDate=I dag ### Static List Editor platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorStaticListEditorItemValueLabel=Værdi platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorStaticListEditorItemIDLabel=ID platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorStaticListEditorAddItemLabel=Tilføj platform.appwithinminutes.classEditorStaticListEditorDeleteItemLabel=Fjern ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.templateProviderEditor.hint=Application entries are wiki pages that contain structured data. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.templateProviderEditor.icon.hint=The icon associated with an application entry. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.templateProviderEditor.description.hint=Short description of an application entry. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.templateProviderEditor.visibilityRestrictions.name=Where to create the entries from ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.templateProviderEditor.visibilityRestrictions.hint=If no location is selected, the entries can be created from any page. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.templateProviderEditor.creationRestrictions.name=Where to create the entries ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.templateProviderEditor.creationRestrictions.hint=If no location is selected, the entries can be created anywhere in the wiki. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.templateProviderEditor.creationRestrictionsAreSuggestions.name=Don't enforce entry location ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.templateProviderEditor.creationRestrictionsAreSuggestions.hint=Use the locations specified above only as suggestions, allowing the user to select a different location when creating an application entry. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.templateProviderEditor.terminal.hint=Whether the application entries should be terminal pages or not. ### Wizard Step 3: Application Presentation platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorClassFieldColumnGroupLabel=Klassefelter platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorGenericColumnGroupLabel=Generiske kolonner platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorHelpTitle=Tip platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorHelpDescription=Generiske live-tabeller er uafhængige af din klasses struktur. De viser information om de sider, der indeholder fuktionerne. platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocTitleColumnName=Sideoverskrift platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocTitleColumnDescription=Viser overskriften på den side, der indeholder funktionen. platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocNameColumnName=Sidenavn platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocNameColumnDescription=Viser navnet på den side, der indeholder funktionen ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocLocationColumnName=Location ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocLocationColumnDescription=The location of the page that contains application data platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocAuthorColumnName=Rettet af platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocAuthorColumnDescription=Den bruger, der sidst har ændret i siden. platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocCreatorColumnName=Oprettet af platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocCreatorColumnDescription=Den bruger, der har oprettet siden. platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocDateColumnName=Ændret platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocDateColumnDescription=Tidspunktet for den seneste ændring platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocCreationDateColumnName=Oprettet platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDocCreationDateColumnDescription=Tidspunktet for oprettelse platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorActionsColumnName=Handlinger platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorActionsColumnDescription=Liste af handlinger, der kan udføres på avendelseslinien, f.eks. redigér eller slet. platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorAttachmentsColumnName=Bilag platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorAttachmentsColumnDescription=Særlig kolonne med henvisninger til bilag for anvendelsessiden. platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorImagesColumnName=Billeder platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorImagesColumnDescription=Særlig kolonne med henvisninger til billeder for funktionen. platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorAvatarColumnName=Logo platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorAvatarColumnDescription=Særlig kolonne til at vise brugerlogo (avatar). Virker kun for klasser bundet til XWiki.Xwikiusers ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorTitleHint=The application title to be displayed on the application home page, on the applications panel and live table, on the breadcrumb, etc. platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDescriptionHint=Beskrivelsen indeholder en kort introduktion til hvade Minut-app'en kan og hvilke data den kan arbejde på. platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorColumnsHint=Vælg de kolonner du kunne tænke dig at se på Minut-app'ens startside. platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorSaveComment=Opdatér Live-tabeller platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorMoveColumnHint=Træk og slip for at ændre rækkefølge platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDeleteColumnHint=Slet platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorAddColumnHint=Tilføj platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorDeprecatedColumnsWarning=Nogle kolonner er forældede, måske fordi de tilsvarende felter i klassen er blevet slettet. Ønsker du at slette disse kolonner? Yes / No platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorIcon=Ikon ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.liveTableEditorIconHintWithPicker=The application icon. You can select an icon from the icon picker or you can reference an attached image. ### Wizard Step 4: Application home page platform.appwithinminutes.appLiveTableHeading=Anvendelser platform.appwithinminutes.appLiveTableEditEntryActionName=Redigér platform.appwithinminutes.appLiveTableDeleteEntryActionName=Slet platform.appwithinminutes.appHomePageActionsHeading=Handlinger platform.appwithinminutes.appHomePageAddEntryLabel=Tilføj platform.appwithinminutes.appHomePageAddEntryHint=Tilføj nyt element platform.appwithinminutes.appHomePageEntryNameLabel=Elementnavn: ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appHomePageDeleteEntriesLabel=Delete all entries platform.appwithinminutes.appHomePageEditAppLabel=Ret elementets navn platform.appwithinminutes.appHomePageTranslateAppLabel=Oversæt minut-app platform.appwithinminutes.appHomePageDeleteAppLabel=Slet anvendelse ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.appHomePageMovedWarning=The application might not function correctly because it has been renamed or moved without updating the code. Please edit the application and follow the steps in order to update the code. ### Missing: AppWithinMinutes.LiveTableClass_description=Description ### Missing: AppWithinMinutes.LiveTableClass_columns=Live Table Columns ### Delete application dialog ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.deleteAppConfirmation=The application {0} and ALL its entries will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue? ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.deleteAppEntriesConfirmation=ALL the entries of the application {0} will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue? ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.deleteAppDoesNotExistError=The specified application does not exist. ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.deleteAppInvalidAppError=The specified name is not a valid App Within Minutes application. ### Missing: platform.appwithinminutes.deleteAppNotSpecifiedError=No application name was specified. ### Rename Application ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.renameApp.changeAppTitleInfo=You can change the application title without renaming the application just by editing the application home page. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.renameApp.regenerateAppCodeWarning=The application code is going to be regenerated if you rename the application. Code customizations will be overwritten as a consequence. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.renameApp.newName.label=New Name ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.renameApp.pageExistsError=A page with this name already exists at the selected location. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.renameApp.locationForbiddenError=You are not allowed to move the application to the selected location. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.renameApp.location.label=New Location ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.renameApp.location.hint=The location in the page hierarchy where to move the application. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.renameApp.parent.label=New Parent ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.renameApp.parent.hint=The new parent page. Leave this field empty if you want to move the application to the top of the page hierarchy. ### Missing: appWithinMinutes.renameApp.inProgress=Renaming application... ### Missing:
